  • Packages that use ca.uqac.lif.cep.functions 
    Package Description
    ca.uqac.lif.cep.functions
    Functions and function trees
    ca.uqac.lif.cep.numbers
    A set of elementary functions for manipulating numbers .
    ca.uqac.lif.cep.tmf
    Processors to manipulate traces of generic events.
    ca.uqac.lif.cep.tuples
    Processors and functions for event traces made of tuples of name-value pairs.
